long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the extension looked forward by all UM Students. The users can auto login into all the UM sites (Maya + all other UM sites) without being able to type/select email and password from password manager every again. Just browse any UM site and ta-da, you are logged In!!  This extension provides you an option to clear credentials OR pause/resume auto-login as per your needs. 

Privacy is always looked forward to in this case. My extension has encrypted the credentials on your local machine itself and not on the server.  It has a unique UI which helps you to clear credentials whenever you require.

Warning : Installation of this extension is not recommended on the public machines
